page.title: 09Housing in rural Sowerby
page.content: Housing in this block is all related to agriculture, with most of the farm houses being occupied by farmers. One farm house, however, is unoccupied, and has been for some 5 years, as the farm is managed as part of a large estate, and presumably no farm worker requires housing. Another farm house has been turned into flats for similar reasons and the flats are occupied by farm workers. The large poultry units have their own "tied" accommodation, attractive modern bungalows right on the job.
